Description: Weight: dīnār. Eight line Kufic inscription. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: This is the first dīnār weight of al-Qāsim and Muslim to be published. The half and third denominations have long been known.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (72)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Muslim b. al-'Arrāf
